statements: SELECT * FROM KPI_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, inventory_turnover_rate FROM KPI_reports;
SELECT * FROM KPI_reports WHERE inventory_turnover_rate > 1.5;
SELECT report_id, order_fulfillment_rate FROM KPI_reports WHERE order_fulfillment_rate < 0.8;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM KPI_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, inventory_turnover_rate, order_fulfillment_rate FROM KPI_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_date, inventory_turnover_rate, order_fulfillment_rate FROM KPI_reports WHERE inventory_turnover_rate > 1.5;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM KPI_reports WHERE inventory_turnover_rate < 1 AND order_fulfillment_rate > 90;
SELECT * FROM KPI_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT report_id, inventory_turnover_rate FROM KPI_reports WHERE order_fulfillment_rate IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM dbo.Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM dbo.Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM dbo.Inventory WHERE turnover_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY turnover_rate DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, turnover_rate FROM dbo.Inventory WHERE id = 3;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM dbo.Orders WHERE fulfillment_rate < 0.8 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM dbo.Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT id, product_name, turnover_rate FROM dbo.Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND turnover_rate > 0.5
SELECT * FROM dbo.Orders WHERE fulfillment_rate < 0.8 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM dbo.Inventory GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM dbo.Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE unit_price > 10;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM kpis WHERE kpi_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY kpi_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY unit_price DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM kpis WHERE kpi_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 25 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_metrics ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_id, inventory_count FROM inventory_metrics WHERE inventory_count > 50;
SELECT SUM(inventory_count) AS total_inventory FROM inventory_metrics;
SELECT order_id, DATE_TRUNC('day', fulfillment_date) AS day_of_fulfillment FROM fulfillment_metrics ORDER BY fulfillment_date ASC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM kpi_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_metrics ORDER BY product_id DESC, inventory_count ASC;
SELECT id, order_id, order_total FROM order_metrics WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT fulfillment_status, COUNT(*) AS count FROM fulfillment_metrics GROUP BY fulfillment_status HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT im.product_id, im.inventory_count, fm.fulfillment_status FROM inventory_metrics im INNER JOIN fulfillment_metrics fm ON im.product_id = fm.order_id;
SELECT metric_name, SUM(metric_value) AS total_value FROM kpi_metrics GROUP BY metric_name ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT id, product_name, cost_price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT product_name, selling_price FROM inventory WHERE cost_price < 50
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT dashboard_id, title, created_by FROM dashboard
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY cost_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, selling_price FROM inventory WHERE cost_price < 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.total_amount, order_items.product_id FROM orders JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id WHERE orders.status = 'Completed';
SELECT metric_name, value, date FROM kpi_metrics WHERE value BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT title, description, created_by FROM dashboard ORDER BY dashboard_id DESC;
